attributes.action: Safe Guarding Children In All Soft Play Areas
attributes.additional_details:
I strongly believe that all soft play areas should have something in place so whoever comes through their doors is a member and their infomation is stored onto a computer, so incidents like this, information will provided to the correct authorities.

http://m.hertfordshiremercury.co.uk/Sexual-assault-involving-young-children-Rye-assic/story-29070774-detail/story.html
attributes.background: A little girl of 5 years old was sexually assaulted by an 8 year old boy and no identification of persons entering this particular soft play area was taken.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition in its current form as it does not call for a clear action from the UK Government and Parliament. You could start a petition calling for soft play areas to be required to keep an electronic register of everyone who is on the premises.
